ygData.subject: A rant
ygData.msgSnippet: I was hunting in the Plane of Sky last night and on tracking what do I see but an npc named Cilin Spellsinger.  As my name is Celandro Spellsong this seems
ygData.messageBody:
I was hunting in the Plane of Sky last night and on tracking what do I see
but an npc named Cilin Spellsinger. As my name is Celandro Spellsong this
seems very suspicious to me. So I petition the npc for having a name so
close to mine and the gms refuse to change it! Seems Verant has the
ability to steal any name they think is good and pervert it to their own
uses! So be careful Harmonic, Talies, Shada, Rokenn, and all the other
bards on this list.. Your name may be the next to be stolen!

Celandro Spellsong

On the look out for that evil npc Shala Stormblade
